entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Uranium City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Uranium City 1:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -27.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -32.5°C
Wind: WSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
